Question: He renewed his relationship with this person, and from this point on, Alexandria was his home.
Hints: According to Plutarch, this person took flight with her ships at the height of the battle and Antony followed her.
Caesar seized the Egyptian capital and imposed himself as arbiter between the rival claims of Ptolemy and this person.
When his armies deserted him and joined with Octavian, he cried out that this person had betrayed him.
